body: For some reason this turn me on
血管凸起真的很色，實用！
Sorry for that reference but... I can't breathe!

...and tells her to not be scared (lol). He confesses that he had his sights on her for the past three months (!) and that he had been practicing on the other women reported in the news. He stops short of strangling her to death because(?). He plays around with her for a bit in her half-comatose state and prepares to enter her. She surprises him with a brick to the face and knocks his mask off revealing his true identity: campus security guard. Various ideas pop into his head on how to get her to not talk (bribery, etc). He arrives at murder. Apparently that was the last straw for him to not hold back (not sure why he was hesitant to kill her in the first place before the reveal - he's already killed a bunch of women). As she draws her last breaths he admires how her face color transitions from a healthy red to a blackish blue to a ghostly white and how he just cannot stop himself because he's so turned on. The scene ends with him fucking her corpse (yes she's dead).

Spoilers/Translation Below:

The girl (Risa?) asks her childhood friend to accompany her home after school because she believes that somebody has been stalking/watching her for the past week. Apparently there has been many cases of women being strangled to death by a masked man since April within the area (story takes place shortly before the summer holidays). The girl jokes about how he's so desperate to lose his virginity that he is only helping her to achieve that end. But she secretly thinks that she doesn't mind the idea if they were going out.

They pass by a sketchy area with abandoned lots/buildings along the way (required travel path). They talk about how he hasn't been over to her house in a long time and how her parents are traveling overseas so she's home alone (but to not get any strange ideas). The boy is knocked unconscious. The masked man assures her that he's not dead and that they should get out of the sun.

He takes her to an abandoned warehouse nearby...

Really good! 10/10

Would love an English translation of it
WHY ME LIKE THIS?  WHAT'S WRONG WITH ME?
